tool.help:
**What it does**
This tool filters results obtained by the segmentation and calling tool.
-----
Input/Output file:
*A tabular text file containing 7 columns:*
- sampleNames: Name of the file. - chrom: Chromosome of the segment. - chromStart: Starting position (in bp) of the segment. This position is not included in the segment. - chromEnd: Ending position (in bp) of the segment. This position is included in the segment. - probes: Number of probes in the segment. - means: Mean of the segment. - calls: Calling of the segment (”double loss”, ”loss”, ”normal”, ”gain” or ”amplification”).
-----
**Citation**
